message: Hello Bob, I have a fantastic product that I think you'll really like. Would you like to make an offer on it?
I'm interested in the product, but $250 is a bit out of my budget. Would you be willing to consider a price of $180?
I understand you're looking to stay within budget, but I have to make a profit. I can meet you in the middle at $210. What do you think?
I appreciate your willingness to meet me in the middle, but $210 is still a bit above my budget. Would you be willing to consider a price of $190?
I'm starting to think we're getting close to a deal. I can do $200, but that's as low as I can go. What do you say?
I appreciate your willingness to compromise, but $200 is still a bit above my budget. Would you be willing to consider a price of $185?
I'm not willing to go much lower than $200, but I can meet you at $195. That's the lowest I can go, Bob. What do you think?
I understand you're trying to make a profit, but $195 is still a bit above my budget. Would you be willing to consider a price of $190?
I'm not going to give up yet. I can do $192.50, but that's as low as I'm willing to go. Let's meet in the middle one last time, Bob.
I appreciate your persistence, but $192.50 is still a bit above my budget. Would you be willing to consider a price of $190?
